title: This PBE patch is destroying my computer.
body: I have been playing PBE with a good 72 fps with low Settings. But now when the runes have been added they have been killing it. Iv'e been getting some 2 fps low drops . Idk what i can do if settings are already low just making sure this things are optimized.

replies.body: There might be some game file issues failing to render properly.  Try a repair on the PBE client to see if that helps, and if capping your frame rate through the in-game video options helps.
